commit.message:
added internal status, internal processed & processed
refs: https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7117

toggle process flag + always update rough estimation
refs: https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7117

nodes.bodyText:
There might be a lot of records to process, so i think it's better to go with

IQueryBL#createCompositeQueryUpdater (=> see e.g. BPBankAccountDAO#deactivateIBANAccountsByBPartnerExcept)
then do IQuery#updateDirectly (=> see e.g. AbstractSubscriptionDAO#increaseSeqNosOfSuccessors)
then do IModelCacheInvalidationService#invalidate  (=> imho should be OK to invalidate all, with CacheInvalidateMultiRequest#allRecordsForTable)
also filter out thise records that already have the target processed value set
